description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Everyone is asking! Walk around the park and answers as many questions as you can from your Avatar friends! See how your answers stack up with others on Xbox Live!
description.short: Everyone is asking! Walk around the park and answers as many questions as you can from your Avatar friends! See how your answers stack up with others on Xbox Live!
